# MeshBuffers.Rate

**Enumeration**

Defines how elements in the buffer map to features of the mesh.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Rate
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **MeshBuffers.Rate.face**: Buffer maps at the face rate.
- **MeshBuffers.Rate.faceVarying**: Buffer maps at the index rate.
- **MeshBuffers.Rate.vertex**: Buffer maps at the vertex rate.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
